Articles.Content:
To reproduce: during a LKO rescue target the vessel normally, rendevous with the vessel and rescue the kerbal. The kerbal is now in your ship, double click the empty vessel to untarget. Now, EVA the kerbal and board- what has been happening to me is that the vessel will be actively targeted again. Not a game breaker, just mildly annoying. This may actually happen during any scene change, like toggling to map view and back, I've been noticing it happening occasionally but finally reproduced it with the EVA move.

Edit: also happens with vessel switching via [ or ], an untargeted vessel will re-target.

Edited November 25, 2016 by Waxing_Kibbous
